ygData.subject: RE: Clouding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry, See Invoice was bugged, and has been removed until they can find out what caused it to work.  When they can return it to it s previously
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:34 PM 2/15/00 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>I have several customers that I would like to cast See Invoice on. Despite
>repeated mailings they still claim that they "never got them". I have come
>to suspect that the Invoices have somehow become invisible in transit and
>are actually in their in boxes. Can you tell me where this song/spell is
>found? It sounds like Ak'Anon or Erudin libraries perhaps?


Sorry, See Invoice was bugged, and has been removed until they can find out
what caused it to work. When they can return it to it's previously
non-functioning status, it will be implemented as a 49th level spell
requiring a 20 pound, 5000 platinum material component, and it will
automatically cause all monsters in the zone to go aggro on the caster.

*snicker*
Talies
